meanings.sent1: The geodetical tools helped the surveyors measure the land accurately.
meanings.sent2: She studied geodetical concepts to understand how to map the terrain.
meanings.sent3: The geodetical calculations made the students feel like math wizards.
meanings.sent4: His geodetical approach to problem-solving was precise and methodical.
meanings.sent5: The geodetical principles guided the construction of the new bridge.

meanings.definition: The branch of applied mathematics that deals with the measurement of the shape and size of the earth.
meanings.sent1: Geodetical involves using math to understand the earth's dimensions.
meanings.sent2: Scientists rely on geodetical to accurately map the planet.
meanings.sent3: The geodetical class was full of students eager to learn about earth measurements.
meanings.sent4: In geodetical, numbers and shapes help us comprehend the world we live in.
meanings.sent5: The importance of geodetical became clear during the geography lesson.
